title: Katie Price's toyboy ex Charles Drury shares cryptic post as he brands Love Island rumours 'fake news'
text:

Katie Price's ex Charles Drury , 22, has hinted at his heartbreak through Instagram quotes and slammed rumours that he is set to star on Winter Love Island.

The builder, who Katie initially dumped her ex fiance Kris Boyson for, took to Instagram on Monday night to upload cryptic Instagram posts hinting that he is moving on from the former glamour model.

Recent speculation has suggested that Pricey’s young fling was lined up to star on the new, winter edition of Love Island in January.

(Image: charlesdrury1/Instagram)

TV bosses were reportedly sniffing around Charles in an attempt to snap him up as a Winter Love Island contestant.

A source told The Sun : “He was approached last year but was seeing someone at the time – but now he’s single, producers called him up and asked him to re-audition for the show.”

However, Charles has put the rumours to bed and branded the Love Island speculation as “fake news”.

He revealed to his 9,000 Instagram followers, “More fake news”, followed by a heart and palm tree emoji.

(Image: charlesdrury1/Instagram)

The unimpressed star then continued to share quotes online hinting that his romance with the 41-year-old mum-of-five didn’t end on good terms.

He shared one post that read: “You never really forget the ones who touched your heart; regardless whether its the ones who broke it or healed it.”

Last week, it was reported that Katie has gone back to ex Kris Boyson, when she was spotted speaking out of his house after spending the night.

Charles’ post suggested he was hurt by how fast Katie returned to her ex Kris, following their recent fling.

(Image: charlesdrury1/Instagram)

The hunky builder tried to add a lighthearted approach to his solemn Instagram posts and included a message about his future plans.

Charles shared: “Good things come to those who wait. But better things come to those who work for it.”

Katie recently unfollowed Charles on social media after he refused to sign a document promising not to spill secrets on their scandalous fling.

(Image: charlesdrury1/Instagram)

The legal contract, also known as a Non Disclosure Agreement, would have prevented Charles from gossiping about Katie, however he refused to sign.

Katie and Charles are believed to have started flirting after he was brought in to fix up her mucky mansion .

But the builder is said to be furious that she has ran back to her ex Kris .

(Image: Instagram)

A source told Sun Online : "Katie wanted Charles to come to the house and talk things out - she’s been begging him not to leave and to take her back.

"But he’s still fuming over her cheating on him and embarrassing him so told her he’s not interested.

Katie was said to be so keen to stop Charles’ gossiping about their relationship that she confiscated his phone and banned him from using social media.
description: Builder Charles shared cryptic posts on his Instagram stories about being heartbroken and achieving things through hard work
